statements.select: SELECT PKID "OrderID", B1_TOTAL_AMOUNT "Amount", ORDER_TOTAL_PIECES "Pieces", ORDER_TOTAL_WEIGHT "Weight", PAYMENT_STATUS "PaymentStatus", ORDER_CODE "Code", UNIQUE_ID "UniqueID", ORDER_STATUS "Status", ORDER_TIME "OrderTime" FROM TORDER WHERE TORDER.VALID='T' AND IS_IMPORT_FROM_ERP=0
